flawed_nl_solution:
If rice weighed 30 kg less than the green beans, then the total rice weight is 60 kg - 30 kg = 30 kg
If the green beans weighed 10 kg more than sugar, then the total sugar weight is 60 kg - 10 kg = <<60-10=50>>50 kg
When 1/3 weight of rice was lost, the weight loss became 1/3*30 = <<1/3*30=10>>10kg
The weight of rice after the loss is 30 kg - 10 kg = <<30-10=20>>20 kg.
When 1/5 weight of sugar was lost, the lost weight was 1/5 * 50 kg = <<1/5*50=250/1>>250/1 kg
The weight of sugar after the loss is 50 kg - 250/1 kg = <<50-250/1=-200>>-200 kg.
The total weight for all the items is -200 kg + 20 kg + 60 kg = <<-200+20+60=-120>>-120 kg
#### -120

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 250/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
